name: My Magical Animal Unicorn Farm
description:
Come to the princess beauty salon and take care of her pony horse. Caring for a pony horse is an amazing adventure surrounded by tons of fun activities you can enjoy in this caring and makeover game! Learn all about the mane braiding and grooming with the princess pony horse!

Perform a total makeover to the princess pony horse while you enjoy the different levels of this beauty salon and makeover game. Caring for the horse will teach the children to love animals whereas the fairyland atmosphere will let them dream of being a princess. This caring and makeover game has all the ingredients of an educational and very fun game! Play now!

Features:
- Enjoy caring of the princess pony horse in the beauty salon for hours!
- This is an intuitive makeover beauty salon game for kids of all ages.
- Come and discover the magic of the princess pony horse grooming!
- Learn all the secrets of the animal makeover and have fun!
- Share pictures of your creations in the beauty salon with friends and family!

Become a princess in this magic kingdom and take your pony horse to the makeover beauty salon for him to look spectacular! Master the caring of a horse with this game! Play now!
